thread.title: Marissa Tomei Fan
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Marissa Tomei Fan

author: Marissa Tomei Fan
title: Marissa Tomei Fan
text: I gave B&H 4 stars, but I only give 4 stars because there is always room for improvement (so really 5 stars). I shop regularly with B&H online. They have competitive prices (#1 reason). They have a wide selection (#2 reason). And they have good, helpful comments from customers. Also I find their suggestions for accessories helpful. Plus Marissa Tomei is from Brooklyn, NY; very close to B&H.
